cause.description:
Hairless beasts are the scum of society. Many rich old people have helped by toting hairless beasts around in their purses. Hairless beasts have no rights. They are constantly spoken out against by the likes of Carrot-top, Sasquatch, and Austin Powers. These beasts need your help. Let's give them the attention they deserve.
1. The suicide rate for hairless beasts is higher than that of the ones posessing hair.
2. Sasquatch sucks
3. Would you like being bald?...I didn't think so!
cause.mission: Help hairless beast regain self-confidence, not be afraid to look in the mirror, and not have to use a blanket
cause.name: Help Hairless Beasts
